reviewText: An excellent entertainment of video songs both b/w and color from the hit movies. A very good bargain of 3 discs for the price of 1. Watch out when unlocking the discs from the package.
I would give 7 STARS ,Picture and Sound quality Excellent ,WONDERFUL COLLECTION OF RARE SONGS.,NEVER GET TIRED LISTENING

The product was ,is  and will be great as I was skeptical in buying,but seeing is believing as when first tried only the audio worked fine,then
came audio with video and the picture was amazing,the sound was good and over all justification was done to the final product. The sound
is either stereo or dolby D,nothing else,so you have only option of stereo mode or center channel does not work,only stereo sound.,very good.
I  was thrilled by the quality of video tranfser,black and white and also early color movies,overall justice is done,sit back and enjoy music.
